docs.lead_paragraph: Philadelphia has 42 firetrap slum schools it would like to tear down and replace, but finding the money has been tough this year. Now, however, the tangle of financing difficulties confronting the city -- and many other local governments as well -- may become less snarled.

headline.main: Money Woes Of U.S. Cities May Slacken; Money Woes of U.S. Cities Lessen
